topic: In modern marriages, should the allocation of household duties be based on traditional gender roles, where women typically handle domestic tasks and childcare while men focus on breadwinning and home maintenance?

initial_response.English_Speaking: In my view, modern marriages should indeed move away from traditional gender roles and embrace a more equitable distribution of household duties. This not only reflects contemporary societal values but also strengthens the bond between partners by promoting mutual understanding and respect. By sharing responsibilities and respecting individual preferences, couples can create a more balanced and fulfilling relationship.

By doing so, marriages can become more harmonious and resilient.
